name: Skyscraper Construction Simulator
description:
Citizens want to meet you again! That time they need a real skyscraper, the highest in the region. So, get down to work. Forget about shovels and hoes! One of the best things about this 3d simulator is that you get to drive multiple heavy vehicles all in one simulator. Learn how to operate all vehicles, even if you are not a builder, but an engineer in your heart.

Features of Skyscraper Construction Trucks:

- Many types of vehicles
- Big real construction
- Skyscraper construction missions
- Realistic vehicle controllers
- Vehicle sounds
- 3D graphics
- Real vehicles to drive

Try all vehicles we have in simulator:

- Excavator
- Truck
- Pile Diver
- Crane
- Concrete Mixer
- Concrete Pump

Complete missions, follow instruction and open new levels. Workers have a lot of tasks for you. Learn how to drive all machines and be the best. Use convenient controls to drive and build a skyscraper. Start with simple tasks with and drive other vehicles in the simulator. Train your construction skills, you can do it!

City needs you! Citizens are dreaming to get a new skyscraper for their business issues. Start your work today! Dig ground with an excavator, deliver cargo with a truck, make piles with a pile diver and do many other construction things!
Try different construction professions in our simulator! Open new levels and get construction tasks. Be accurate, pick things and put to the right place. Enjoy the realistic 3D graphics and smooth controls of the vehicles you can control. Drive all over the city to do various missions, the construction is not easy!

This construction simulator is a game for all ages, everyone can build here! If your dream is to build a city skyscraper, we made the construction simulator for you. Use powerful vehicles to finish construction. Even you are too young to have a driving license. Do it, test your construction skills. It is hard and fun at the same time. But don't worry, you'll have all the instructions in the construction simulator.
Prepare for work and become the best specialist in city construction! Build a skyscraper in simulator by operating a truck, excavator, crane and other machines! Try Skyscraper Construction Trucks, build a skyscraper of your dream!
